system.description:
Elemental knights hold similar tenets, reflecting the noble pursuit of the scholarly knight.

  • Live Responsibly. Your life has consequences. Seek righteousness in all things.
  • Study Courageously. Learn everything you can. No fact of the matter has power over the faith in your heart.
  • Serve With Integrity. Always question why and for whom you lift your blade. Always back the true cause of justice.
  • Act Decisively. Build contingencies and outplan enemies, but never let these distract you from your chance at victory.
